methods.name: getCells
methods.rawdescription: Creates specified number of Empty initialized Table cells
methods.description: Creates specified number of Empty initialized Table cells

methods.name: getRowWithCells
methods.rawdescription:
Gets a Table row with initialized cells
1) Merges existing cells
2) removes extra cells, if needed
3) adds empty initialized additional cells, if needed
methods.description:
Gets a Table row with initialized cells

  1. Merges existing cells
  2. removes extra cells, if needed
  3. adds empty initialized additional cells, if needed

jsdoctags.comment: TableRow, if null, creates a new row self initialized cells

methods.name: getTable
methods.rawdescription: Returns a new Table having provided number of rows and columns, and with sample data in cells.
methods.description: Returns a new Table having provided number of rows and columns, and with sample data in cells.

jsdoctags.comment: TableInfo - existing table, if updates needed. Provide null if new table is needed.

injectables.description:
TableService service provides methods and functionality for tabular content creation.

  1. Creates a table.
  2. Updates a table.
  3. Table can be used in content editor.
injectables.rawdescription:
TableService service provides methods and functionality for tabular content creation.
1) Creates a table.
2) Updates a table.
3) Table can be used in content editor.

directives.name: ContenteditableValueAccessorDirective

hostListeners.name: blur
hostListeners.rawdescription: Listen to blur event to mark control as touched
hostListeners.description: Listen to blur event to mark control as touched

hostListeners.name: input
hostListeners.rawdescription:
Listen to input events to write innerHTML value into control,
also disconnect MutationObserver as it is not needed if this
event works in current browser

components.name: AiArticlesComponent

methodsClass.rawdescription: Add Additional Prompts from subtopics and questions.
methodsClass.description: Add Additional Prompts from subtopics and questions.

components.description: AiArticles Component generates articles using AI apis, It works in a Queue, so that the process can be paused and resumed any time. Keeps showing the progress and status of whole queue as well as Queue items. All completed items are saved to articles data base.
components.rawdescription:
AiArticles Component generates articles using AI apis, It works in a Queue, so that the process can be paused and resumed any time.
Keeps showing the progress and status of whole queue as well as Queue items. All completed items are saved to articles data base.

components.description:

  3. Add/update/remove CSS classes from table/rows/cells
